name: Barclay Chemicals Manufacturing
goal:
Barclay focuses on the registration, sourcing and formulation of herbicides and fungicides for the European market. Understanding and fulfilling the needs of our customers on a local and European level using the highest quality standards and dedicated service.

Our mission is to:
足-Provide agronomic performance for the grower and a low risk margin opportunity for customers
足-Obtain independent product registrations
足-Source the best raw materials globally
-足Ensure complete traceability along our supply chain
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: The Barclay business focus is on chemicals and specifically pesticides regulation
